plot: While the teacher is faced towards the blackboard, one of the students makes some funny noises. The teacher can't find the person who did that, so he decides to dismiss a group of students ...
title: Ghazieh-e Shekl-e Aval, Ghazieh-e Shekl-e Dou Wom
